contextId.occurrenceNote: The word "because" can be used to make clear that God's wrath causes human life to end. Alternate translation: "Our lives come to an end because of your wrath" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/writing-connectingwords]])
contextId.glQuote: Our life passes away under your wrath

contextId.occurrenceNote: Possible meanings are 1) this further describes those who honor God or 2) this indicates the purpose for those who honor God to return to the writer. Alternate translation: "so that they may learn your covenant decrees" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/writing-connectingwords]])
contextId.glQuote: those who know your covenant decrees
